title: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be enabled only when there are changes to be compiled or built.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the Java perspective. 2. Right-click anywhere in the code editor. 3. Observe that the "Build" action in the popup menu is always enabled, even when there are no changes in the code.
